control.content:
8 ActivateWindow(Weather) special://skin/backgrounds/weather.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Weather_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoWeatherButton) !Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeatherFanart) | IsEmpty(Skin.String(WeatherFanartDir))
8 ActivateWindow(Weather) special://skin/backgrounds/weather.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(WeatherFanartDir)]$INFO[Weather.FanartCode] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoWeatherButton) Skin.HasSetting(ShowWeatherFanart) + !IsEmpty(Skin.String(WeatherFanartDir))
1 ActivateWindow(Pictures) special://skin/backgrounds/pictures.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Pictures_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoPicturesButton)
2 ActivateWindow(Music) special://skin/backgrounds/music.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Music_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMusicButton)
3 ActivateWindow(Videos) special://skin/backgrounds/videos.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Video_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoVideosButton) + ![Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMoviesButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoTVShowsButton)]
3 ActivateWindow(VideoFiles) special://skin/backgrounds/videos.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Video_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoVideosButton) + [Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMoviesButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoTVShowsButton)]
20342 ActivateWindow(VideoLibrary,MovieTitles,return) special://skin/backgrounds/videos.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Movies_Folder)] Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMoviesButton) + Library.HasContent(Movies)
20343 ActivateWindow(VideoLibrary,TVShowTitles,return) special://skin/backgrounds/videos.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_TVShow_Folder)] Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoTVShowsButton) + Library.HasContent(TVShows)
<-- Custom Home -->
0 ActivateWindow(Programs,Addons,return) special://skin/backgrounds/programs.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Programs_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoProgramsButton)
13000 ActivateWindow(Settings) special://skin/backgrounds/settings.jpg $INFO[Skin.String(Home_Custom_Back_Settings_Folder)] !Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoSettingsButton)
